Rpassword.title: Forgot Password
Rpassword.detail: How would you like to reset your password?
Rpassword.descEmail: We will send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
Rpassword.descPhone: We will text you a verification code to reset your password .

Index.front1: A single platform bringing together artisans, engineers, businessmen, and suppliers
Index.back1: Our platform is the comprehensive destination that meets all your needs in one place. No matter what you're looking for, you'll find it all here, from skilled artisans to multiple payment options. We make things easy for you so you can focus on building your home or project without hassle.
Index.back2: We are committed to providing quality and assurance at every step. By choosing us, you ensure receiving the high-quality service you deserve. We are here to ensure your complete satisfaction and to achieve your goals with confidence and peace of mind.
Index.front3: Our platform offers multiple payment methods to meet your needs conveniently and easily.
Index.back3: We are pleased to offer you multiple payment methods through our platform to ensure your comfort and ease of transactions. Regardless of the payment method you prefer, you will find the perfect solution to your needs. We are here to make the payment process smooth and convenient for you.
